channel.title: Evil King sees MM as Unseen before N4
channel.description:
#### What happened? I played Evil King. N3 I checked a player and he appeard to be Unseen. We executed him D4 and that was MM.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? "Allies" ability should be equal for all types of Kings, so before N4 MM should appear as BD for all types of Kings.
#### Steps to reproduce:
#### Comments: First 3 days is a period when Observers often follow King and people ask King to check someone concrete (in last game psy linked me and asked to check 1). If you are Evil King you are forced to sometimes out Unseen if you checked him because othewise you become very suspicious and then are easily executed. You actually can afford sometimes to out Assasin or someone converted because MM can convert again. But you can't afford to out MM, because it's too critical for Unseen. That's why Evil King must see MM as BD in first 3 nights. Because otherwise you can never out any Unseen as Evil King and that makes you autoexecuted at D4-D6. If you out Unseen in D2-D4, he is immediately executed and if it's MM than everyone also understands that your are Evil King because you see MM as Unseen in first 3 nights.

This just happened in a game I was in, but the King was BD. Turns out Scorned tossed a frame onto the MM n3 for yolo. I guess a frame overrides the immunity otherwise, might work that way for Duchess camo and other “mislead” type powers too.
